content.rendered:
New York pitch deck Design Agency

We Create World-Class Pitch Decks For Disruptors Across the Globe.

From Seed to Series C and beyond, our New York Pitch deck business has designed great presentations for extremely successful startups. It’s now your turn.

Get In Touch

New York pitch deck design agency

We Create Pitch Decks That Close Deals​

We’re a pitch deck agency with a team of experts who are skilled in crafting compelling decks that seal deals. Whether you’re a fledgling seed-stage startup or a rapid-scaling venture on the brink of unicorn status, we possess the know-how and creative flair you require.

Need things done quickly? No problem. We can deliver with a turnaround time as short as one week.

Get A Quote

New York Pitch Deck Agency

Our pitch deck Design process

Close your round faster with a top-rated pitch deck agency.

Let’s Discuss

We’re here to really get to know you. Let's talk about your fundraising goals, what you're looking for in a pitch deck, and how we can work together to get you there you want to go.

Market Research

We don't just understand you and your company; our digital sleuths and access to comprehensive data enable us to dive into your industry, rivals, and their websites. Your pitch deck will stand out from the crowd.​

Slide Planning

New York investors are pressed for time. That's why we'll make use of ours to ensure you and your company shine brightly. Our presentation experts refine the pitch deck's structure to present all essential details in an investor-friendly way.

Content Creation

Our New York copywriters are the royalty of content creation. Whether we're crafting new deck material or refining what you already have, the results will leave you amazed.

Design

Now, here's the thrilling part! Our skilled New York pitch deck designers infuse your deck with stunning visuals, making it uniquely yours and narrating your story in the most captivating manner possible.

Let’s Raise the Roof

Well, maybe this is the really fun part… Show me the money! Time for you to pitch, secure that investment, and get back to business.

Just Looking for a Redesign? No Problem,
We Can Help Out With That Too!

we’re pro PITCH DECK DESIGNers in New York

Why Go With A Pitch Deck Design Agency?

Let’s Be Real… While You Know Your Startup Best, Design Most Likely Isn’t Your Specialty!

A strong pitch deck can determine whether you succeed in closing a funding round or not.

We’ve crafted pitch decks for diverse industries like finance, fashion, healthcare, and real estate. Our team is here to guide you through the process and ease the stress.

New York Pitch Deck Agency FAQs

Pitch Deck Design FAQs

Here are some FAQs and answers to ease your mind.

How do you ensure that my pitch deck is tailored to my industry and audience?
We conduct a thorough analysis of your industry and target audience to ensure that the pitch deck is tailored to their specific needs and interests. This includes researching industry trends, analyzing competitors, and understanding the pain points and motivations of your target audience.
How many slides should a pitch deck have?
A pitch deck can have anywhere from 10 to 20 slides, depending on the complexity of the business and the goals of the pitch. It’s important to keep the pitch deck concise and focused on the most important information.
Can you provide examples of pitch decks you've developed for other clients?
Yes, we can provide examples of pitch decks we’ve developed for other clients upon request. These can give you an idea of the style and format of our pitch decks and how we’ve helped other businesses effectively communicate their value proposition.
How long does it take to develop a pitch deck?
The time it takes to develop a pitch deck can vary depending on the complexity of the business and the goals of the pitch. Typically, it takes about 1-2 weeks for a basic deck and up to a month for a more complex one.

contact our team

what are you waiting for? Let’s make some Magic together.

Fill in our short contact form for a no-obligation consultation with a member of our team.

  • hello@burstdgtl.com
  • +1 (415) 520-8622
  • +1 (917) 391-0743
  • +44 (0)20 3037 8935
